titleStmt.title: Saints by calling: or Called to be saints A godly treatise of our holy calling to Christ, by the gospell. With the seuerall gifts proper vnto the called: and their counterfeits in the hypocrites which are not partakers of this effectuall calling. Written by Thomas Wilson, minister of Gods word, at S. Georges Church in Canterbury.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, Thomas, 1563-1622.

titleStmt.title: Saints by calling: or Called to be saints A godly treatise of our holy calling to Christ, by the gospell. With the seuerall gifts proper vnto the called: and their counterfeits in the hypocrites which are not partakers of this effectuall calling. Written by Thomas Wilson, minister of Gods word, at S. Georges Church in Canterbury.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, Thomas, 1563-1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Iaggard, dwelling in Barbican,

notesStmt.note: John Jaggard worked as a printer in London 1593-1623.
Errata on recto of 3G4, final leaf.
Some print show-through; page 349 stained but readable.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
